评论概述: Completely different material from other colors
评论详情: I already have this exact bolero in both black and white, they’re a slightly thicker, matte fabric that holds a really flattering form. I really wanted to like this color but it’s: a) shiny for some reason, and b) thin. That means the seam, which comes together at the top of the slump shoulder, has an awkward peak to it. The whole thing just doesn’t fit correctly, making for an unflattering silhouette.

This crop cardigan is a great addition to my wardrobe! The material feels soft and high-quality, making it comfortable to wear all day. The medium size fits perfectly—not too tight or too loose—and the cropped length adds a flattering touch to any outfit. The white color is versatile and looks crisp and stylish, whether paired with jeans, dresses, or skirts. It’s lightweight yet warm enough for layering. Overall, I’m very happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a cute and practical cardigan!

Great quality and cozy. Sleeves were a little long for me. Material was nice warm And thick. I got an XL but probably could’ve did a L.

I purchased this sweater in black. It has some weight to it, making it a warm, quality and versatile option to wear beyond the gym. It’s cozy, thick. If you want  a perfect fit, I recommend going up a size, as it fits kind of snug. It’s worth the buy.

This is such a cute shrug! I didn't expect to love it as much as I did. I got numerous compliments on how cute my outfit was. I wore this to a concert in the late fall, so it's pretty cold out at night. It kept me as warm as I would have been in my normal coat. The material is really thick, soft, and cozy. Definitely a good purchase.

I normally wear US plus size 3x or 2x depending on material. But I got a size XL in light apricot for a last minute beach trip. It fit perfectly and has a lot of stretch. It’s very comfortable and flattering. It is a pretty thick material nice for keeping your arms warm. I like how it was loose so I can pull the off the shoulder look. Sleeves are a little long, I am 5’6. Overall super cute, I want more colors!! :)

I’m 5’11”, broad shouldered and long armed, and normally wear size L/XL in tops. I get hot easily in full cardigans even with a tank underneath, but like to have some arm coverage in the fall and winter so have this a try. Bought it in an XL and it fits exactly as I’d hoped. Great length for the gorilla arms. Hits right below the ladies, accentuating the waist nicely. Material seems good quality and not too thick, so it will be perfect for fall/winter for this easily toasted broad. This try-on was straight out of the package so not sure what it will look like after a wash. If I lose any length I’ll be sure to update! All in all a great piece. I’ll be purchasing in more colors!
So soft and impressive quality. So excited to wear with outfits this fall/winter
The perfect Bolero for spring and summer. I live in Florida so I wear it all year round. Keeps your shoulders warm from those overly drafty air conditioned restaurants and looks great with anything

Was very soft be try comfortable fabric and for all the little people who are like “Im not sure if xs is small enough” I assure you it is! I got this product and it was very well fitted and didn’t have unflattering bunches in the arms or sleeves that went over my hands it fit perfectly
I bought this sweater for my granddaughter. It arrived quickly, is of good quality, sizing was accurate and she loves it.

Paired it with this black dress and it was so soft! I’m about 220 lbs and Got an XL because I wanted a bit looser and it fit exactly how I wanted it to! The color is amazing and I loved it. It kept me warm but a nice balance of staying cool too.
Great quality and very flattering. It’s thick but not too thick. It’s worth the money, my only complaint is that it slides off my shoulders kinda easily.
I have a large chest & usually get an XL or bigger but the L was perfect! Get it!
The quality was great. It fits perfectly. I love it goes with everything.

The product is very cheap and they don’t refund full amount
Soft material would buy again

I really like this shrug. I had been looking for a while and I’m glad I went with this one. It’s comfortable and a little thick so it’s a nice layer when it starts to get breezy or chilly. Love this! Very soft and comfortable. Perfect for keeping my arms and shoulders warm while reading in bed before falling asleep.

Very nice bolero. It isn’t too thin and the material feels really good quality. I like to wear it with my casual dresses for an extra bit of style. It’s not like the typical Bowlero that is formfitting; There is a little bit Of room for thicker shirts or dresses. Color did not run when I washed it.
